Name: Statuette of an adorant
Description: The votive statuette on a rectangular base represents a kneeling man holding a statue of Osiris in front of him. He wears a short kilt, a wide collar and bracelets. The curls of his short-cropped hair are imitated by small dots. The back pillar has a shape of a stela with a figure of Isis. The left, front and right sides of the base bear an inscription with a prayer to Osiris on behalf of a certain Hor.
